trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There were no other sightings in Winnipeg on or around December 7th 2012
Summary: Multiple lights in sky over Winnipeg Manitoba Canada
divs: sighting detailsi was at home watching tv and noticed several bright lights in the sky toward the east. i live very close to the winnipeg international airport and am very familiar with planes landing\departing. these were not aircraft. they were high in the northeastern sky and were hovering for quite some time. they eventually vanished without fading. they were just gone. i took some pictures but unfortunately couldn't get my tripod set up in time, so the pictures are a little blurry. they were taken outside and not through a window. i am up about 70 feet (balcony) so these shots are elevated. attached are the original pictures. i have not edited or cropped them.
